sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_7f2cc7f3db8a7600b793f2b6ae96194d
sys_update_xml.payload: c.pe-support-options { margin-top: 20px; p { font-size: 18px; color: #485563; } h2 { font-size: 18px; font-weight: 600; color: #2a3342; } .options { margin: 0 -15px; padding: 0; li { padding-left: 15px; font-size: 16px; border-top: solid 1px #cccccc; position: relative; svg { stroke: #4a4a4a; fill: #4a4a4a; } } li:first-child { border: none; } li:hover, li:active { font-size: 16px; color: #ffffff; background-color: #2a3342; svg { stroke: #fff; fill: #fff; } } .icon { position: absolute; top: 50%; margin-top: -12px; } .info { padding: 10px 0 10px 30px; .title { font-size: 16px; } .subtitle { font-size: 15px; color: #808080; } } } }sp_instancefalsepe-support-optionsfalsePE Support Options[{"name":"title","label":"Title","type":"string"},{"name":"category","label":"Category","type":"string"},{"name":"items","label":"Items","type":"string"}]falsefalsesp_widgetadmin2017-04-17 22:37:34true7f2cc7f3db8a7600b793f2b6ae96194d53PE Support Optionsglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_7f2cc7f3db8a7600b793f2b6ae96194dadmin2017-04-18 17:26:49
